import React from "react"; import "../CheckoutForm/CheckoutForm.css"; import { useCartContext } from "../../Contexts/CartContext"; const CheckoutForm = () => { const { cart, reduceCart } = useCartContext(); return (

A un click de tu compra

Completá los datos solicitados para confirmar tu pedido

Total a pagar: ${reduceCart}

); }; export default CheckoutForm;
